Welcome to my academic blog! This space will feature posts about my research, thoughts on economics, data analysis tutorials, and reflections on academic life.

## What to Expect

I plan to write about:

- **Research updates**: New papers, works in progress, and research ideas
- **Methods and tools**: R programming, econometrics, data visualization
- **Academic life**: Conference experiences, teaching, and professional development
- **Economics and policy**: Thoughts on current economic issues and policy debates

## Stay Connected

You can follow along by:

- Subscribing to the [RSS feed](index.xml)
- Following me on [GitHub](https://github.com/lorenzoFabbri)
- Connecting on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/lorenzo-fabbri-303185383/)

Thank you for visiting, and I hope you find the content interesting and useful!
